CustomField.description: SLA Date Time field value for UI purpose
CustomField.formula:
IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c,"Activate"),ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c,"Modify"),ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c,"Deactivate")), (IF(OR(ISBLANK(SLA_Service_Date_Time__c)), "", MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 6, 2 ) & "/" & MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 9, 2 ) & "/" & LEFT( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24)), 4 ) & " " & TEXT( IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) &":"& MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 15, 2 ) &" "& IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + (7/24) ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "PM", "" ) & " " & IF( $Setup.tz__lt_app_settings__c.tz__Abbreviation__c, 'EST',""))) , (IF(OR(ISBLANK( Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c ),ISBLANK(SLA_Service_Date_Time__c)), "", MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 6, 2 ) & "/" & MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 9, 2 ) & "/" & LEFT( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 4 ) & " " & TEXT( IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) &":"& MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 15, 2 ) &" "& IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( SLA_Service_Date_Time__c + Location__r.tz__UTC_Offset_F__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) & " " & IF( $Setup.tz__lt_app_settings__c.tz__Abbreviation__c, Location__r.tz__Timezone_F__c,"")))
)
CustomField.label: SLA Service Date/Time
